<script>
		    //Function that runs on Inspection page load
            $(function() {
			  //Grab system date, set as variable "todaysDate"

              var date1 = igedit_getById("ctl00_Main_Date1_datInpt");

              date1.setDate(todaysDate);
            });
          </script>
